```{python}
import duckdb as db
import os
from dotenv import load_dotenv
load_dotenv('.env')
```

```{python}
# database connection
token = os.getenv('MD_TOKEN')
conn = db.connect(f"md:?motherduck_token={token}")
```

```{python}
conn.sql(f"create or replace table projects.datawrapper_data as select * from  'data.csv'")
```

```{python}
conn.close()
```
